Siswa SMP di Kota Malang Ikuti Pendidikan Anti Korupsi
01 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Hanum Oktavia


Siswa SMP di Kota Malang Ikuti Pendidikan Anti Korupsi

KBRN, Malang: Puluhan siswa Sekolah Menengah Pertama (SMP) di Kota Malang mengikuti kegiatan pendidikan anti korupsi yang digelar di gazebo Balaikota Malang, Jumat (01/11/2019). Pendidikan anti korupsi itu merupakan rangkaian kegiatan gelaran karya kartun bertemakan 'Demokrasi Dikorupsi' yang digelar oleh komunitas pegiat anti korupsi.
Dalam rangkaian kegiatan pendidikan anti korupsi ini, salah satunya menghadirkan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) Malang. Dalam hal ini, selain memberikan pengetahuan tentang seluk beluk Industri Jasa Keuangan (IJK), juga diberikan pemahaman tentang bagaimana OJK mencegah tindak pidana korupsi dalam IJK. 
"Siswa bisa memahami sejak dini mengenai tugas-tugas OJK, kemudian kaitannya dengan tugas dan kewenangan. Kami juga menjelaskan bagaimana peranan OJK dalam mencegah tindak pidana korupsi dari sisi OJK sebagai pengawas IJK, maupun bagaimana OJK membangun sistem untuk mencegah tindak pidana korupsi terjadi di industri jasa keuangan itu," kata Kepala OJK Malang, Sugiarto Kasmuri.
Pendidikan soal IJK dan pencegahan korupsi ini, sambungnya, memang tepat diberikan pada siswa sekolah. Sebab, melalui dunia sekolah, anak-anak bisa mencari dan mendapatkan pengetahun baru.
"Sehingga kami punya kewajiban untuk mendorong dunia pendidikan, tidak hanya apa yang biasa mereka pelajari di sekolah, tetapi juga harus memhamai apa yang terjadi di lingkungan sekitar. Mereka jadi paham bank dan asuransi itu siapa yang mengawasi dan bertanggungjawab. Harapannya, masyarakat bisa bertransaksi dengan baik dan aman," tuturnya.
Pihaknya berharap, kegiatan edukasi seperti ini bisa dilaksanakan secara berkelanjutan. Dengan seringnya dilakukan kegiatan pendidikan anti korupsi, maka siswa menjadi lebih paham tentang apa itu korupsi dan bagaimana pencegahannya. "Edukasi pada siswa sekolah dilakukan secara berkelanjutan, hingga di masa depan mendatang, mereka siap mengatakan anti korupsi," tandas Sugiarto.
Salah seorang siswa SMP Kristen Malang, Santa Yelling menilai pendidikan anti korupsi bermanfaat bagi siswa. "Sangat bagus kegiatan seperti ini, kita jadi paham bank, asuransi, sekaligus tahu apa itu korupsi dan bagaimana mencegahnya," pungkas siswi kelas VII ini. 
Selain kegiatan pendidikan anti korupsi, kegiatan tersebut juga diwarnaia pameran dan saweran kartun, pembacaan puisi, diskusi anti korupsi, ngobrol bareng seniman kartun, dan kegiatan lainnya.

Middle School Students in Malang Take Anti-Corruption Education
Nov 1 2019, 15:40 by Hanum Oktavia


Middle School Students in Malang Take Anti-Corruption Education

KBRN, Malang: Dozens of Junior High School (SMP) students in Malang participated in an anti-corruption education activity that was held at the Malang City Hall gazebo, Friday (01/11/2019). The anti-corruption education program is a series of activities held by cartoons with the theme 'Democracy Corruption' held by the anti-corruption activist community.
In this series of anti-corruption education activities, one of them presents the Financial Services Authority (OJK) Malang. In this case, in addition to providing knowledge about the ins and outs of the Financial Services Industry (IJK), also given an understanding of how the FSA prevents criminal acts of corruption in the IJK.
"Students can understand early on about OJK's tasks, then related to duties and authority. We also explain how OJK's role is in preventing corruption from the OJK side as an IJK supervisor, as well as how OJK is building a system to prevent corruption in the industry. financial services, "said the head of Malang FSA, Sugiarto Kasmuri.
Education about IJK and corruption prevention, he continued, is appropriate for school students. Because, through the world of school, children can find and get new knowledge.
"So we have an obligation to encourage the world of education, not only what they normally learn at school, but also must understand what is happening in the surrounding environment. They come to understand banks and insurance who are supervising and responsible. Hopefully, the public can transact with good and safe, "he said.
He hopes that educational activities like this can be carried out sustainably. With the frequent activities of anti-corruption education activities, students become more aware of what corruption is and how to prevent it. "Education of school students is carried out on an ongoing basis, so that in the future, they are ready to say anti-corruption," said Sugiarto.
One of Malang Christian Middle School students, Santa Yelling considered anti-corruption education to be beneficial for students. "Very good activities like this, we come to understand banks, insurance, as well as know what corruption is and how to prevent it," concluded this VII grade student.
In addition to anti-corruption education activities, these activities are also colored by exhibitions and saweran cartoons, poetry readings, anti-corruption discussions, chatting with cartoon artists, and other activities.
